description: 1 x Mature Pyracantha (applicants ref. T1) - Approximately 6.50m: Reduce overlong branches approximately 1.00m-1.50m.1 x Palm (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 5.00m: Remove dead leaf and fruit.1 x Conifer (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 3.00m:  Growing beneath Hornbeam: Reduce/trim to tidy approximately 0.3m.1 x Multi stemmed Lime (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 11.00m: Reduce lateral and sub lateral branches back from garden by 2.00m.1 x Mature Apple (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 4.00m: Acute lean. Reduce back to previous and most recent reduction points approximately 1.20m. Thin crown density throughout by 20%. Raise crown over lawn by up to 0.50m.Rear corner hedge: Approximately 3.50m: Reduce by approximately 1.00m to tidy.1 x Ornamental Pear (applicants ref. T6) - Approximately 4.50m: Remove major dead wood. Reduce back to previous reduction points approximately 0.30m.1 x Multi-stemmed Amelanchier (applicants ref. T7) - Approximately 6.00m: Thin crown density throughout by approximately 20%. Reduce lateral and sub lateral growth by approximately 30-40cm (tip prune) to control encroachment from ornamental pear.Mixed species hedge: Approximately 4.00m: Bamboo privet: Tidy poor pruning line and grade in as is practicable.Bay hedge: Approximately 4.00m: Remove dead stem. Reduce face back to tidy and control encroachment. reduce height back to previous and most recent reduction points approximately 0.75.Front of hedge: Yew: Approximately 4.00m: Trim to tidy approximately 30cm.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
